website_summaries.verdict: The Baffin Zone’s success in outdoor adventures was evident in the positive feedback it received. It was appreciated for its excellent comfort, warmth, and traction. Also, it did not require a lengthy softening period. However, its seemingly flimsy sole and inaccurate sizing made the others unsatisfied. Nevertheless, despite the drawbacks reported, the Baffin Zone still provided an excellent outdoor performance.
pros: The Baffin Zone is praised by a lot of owners for its amazing grip, especially on icy surfaces
The warmth of this above-the-ankle winter boot has pleased many verified purchasers
An expert is delighted with its soft and form-fitting interior
It is a very comfortable pair of hikers, based on a handful of user reviews
Some owners have expressed their approval of the Zone’s great fit
This Baffin snow boot surprises a lot of users with its lightness
A considerable number of buyers mention that they appreciate its minimal break-in period
The roomy toe box of the Baffin Zone is not left unnoticed by plenty of wearers
cons: More than a handful of customers have felt frustrated when the sole of the Baffin Zone fell off after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a USPS carrier in Indianpolis. In the winter, which it is as I'm writing this, I walk through snow consistently. I've worn these boots 2 days now, water seeped in to the toe area both times. These boots are advertised as waterproof, and are not. For that they deserve a zero rating.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Majchen

customer_reviews.title: Great tread but the craftsmanship is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Baffin's for several years now and they have great tread and are waterproof. Unfortunately, these boots still have great tread and are waterproof the top snap pulled out (where the laces go around to make it fit well) just after the 30 day return was up. I've tried to fit it back in but it's disappointing after spending 100$ on new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Purtee

customer_reviews.title: I do a great deal of walking outdoors for my job
customer_reviews.text: I do a great deal of walking outdoors for my job. The shoes were great when I first started wearing them (Nov. 2017), no problems, stayed dry in lighter amounts of snow & wet conditions. I started having problems with them in late January into February 2018. My feet would be wet in the front of the shoe, not good if it is only 15 degrees or less out. Had to switch to a different boot.
customer_reviews.author: dlb

customer_reviews.title: I bought a half size higher (9.5 bought 10)
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, toe box is a little loose but i like that as it gives me wiggle room. Walking on straight ice is a challenge still but other then that good traction. Great warmth. No issues with leaking. A little heavy but most good winter boots are. Survived one winter without getting beat up so hopefully get atleast 2 more winters out of them.
customer_reviews.author: c m k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot for winter.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a better shoe for the winter without having big clunky boots. These fit the bill. Very light on the foot so you don't wear out from walking in them. Extremely insulated. My feet sometimes get too sweaty if I'm inside with them on such as a grocery store. The tread is aggressive and holds packy snow like no other. Still be careful on ice as they are not studded. I recommend these boots especially if you live in the northern states and Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. First pair of boots From Baffin
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. First pair of boots I ever ordered on the web. I wear an 8 1/2 in USA size... These have no half size so I ordered a 9 which is ok as I can "SOCK UP" to size. These are my slush/ice /snow boots, so they won't be worn much. I demand quality.. Dryness...traction and WARMTH. I have smallish feet, normal width, so I rarely have an issue with sizes. just wish they weren't made in China. I like Canada... I like the goods they make in country... Why not these boots?... I have to hold back a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Good cool weather boot
customer_reviews.text: Good cool weather boot. I've been using these as a cool weather boot when I have to work outside. They are light and seem durable given the weight. I usually have a size 10 to 10.5 EEEE. I went with a size 11 and the fit fairly well. The might be a little lose in the heal if I didn't have thick socks on. These are a good alternative to clunky snow boots if you aren't going to be out all day.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Warm and I mean WARM. They keep your feet completely dry and are very comfortable. I was very impressed with the traction ability of these boots as well. We have a Trex deck out front so when there is freezing rain overnight, falls are likely to occur. This being said since receiving these boots I never slipped again on my way to the morning shovel routine. The Bad: A little clunky, but it's a snow boot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Good

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot... For bad snow days the only thing that beats these boots are the Baffin Huricanes
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable boot.. Supportive, waterproof with good grip in mud and snow. Stylish for a winter or late fall boot.. Not big huge winter boot. Feels like a lightweight hiker but tackles everything I've thrown at it so far.
customer_reviews.author: wdodge45

customer_reviews.title: Good boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice light, warm boot. Granted I dont hunt in these. I do light construction walking all day. In the winter they keep my toes warm with a good pair of socks. Way better than tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Garmoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and quality seems good
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11.5 and ordered a 12 - perfect for me. Headed back to work in a few weeks (Alaska, North Slope) and will try to remember to post an update - these are just to wear back and forth while traveling to the rig, not to actually work in.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C. Lott

customer_reviews.title: I love the boot if it was a little wider i ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the boot if it was a little wider i think it would be a get fit..But im sure it's not the boots fault on how it fit's to my feet
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my husband, better than he thought
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband, better than he thought! Looks great, good packaging and super good deal! Waterproof, we bought size 10 and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Diamondspirit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: No issues .. Everyday wear ... Out door work on 2 acres
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: But definitely a way better than a few winter boots that I tries in ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a only few days to put on this winter. But definitely a way better than a few winter boots that I tries in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these boots. They are a little more than I feel comfortable spending on shoes, but they are worth every penny. Comfortable, warm, great traction and stylish are all words I would use to describe them.
customer_reviews.author: Cracker

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome, look, comfort and rain proof, perfect if your an outdoors kind of person even in the rain or snow.
customer_reviews.author: darrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit great with one pair of socks. Using for early season Bow-hunting. Really light weight and well made
customer_reviews.author: William Capelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very warm shoe but runs small even allowing for thick socks
customer_reviews.author: Debi Webi

customer_reviews.title: Toe Touch The Tip, but...
customer_reviews.text: The back was cut low, exactly what I wanted for walking pavement. These are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jeffreyB!

customer_reviews.title: They are light and comfortable. They are warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a size too small. Once I got the correct size I have no complaints. They are light and comfortable. They are warm and dry. They are tall enough to make it through most of the crud in the parking lots, unless you've just had a really big snow fall.
customer_reviews.author: Goober Pea

customer_reviews.title: ... the rainy season in Southern California and these work great. They are a little warm on my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the rainy season in Southern California and these work great. They are a little warm on my feet because they are usually used for snow, but they are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size up based on other reviews and they are a perfect fit. Very warm and very comfortable. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Raport

customer_reviews.title: Don't like cold feet, BUY these..
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your feet toasty warm & dry in really COLD weather, & are SO LIGHT !! Best shoes I've found, well worth the price. I can't stand my feet cold & with these shoes I'm nice & warm !!! S C
customer_reviews.author: stanley croston jr

customer_reviews.title: Great boot. They do fit snug but not uncomfortably ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. They do fit snug but not uncomfortably so. I ordered in my normal size (10) and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ZRD

customer_reviews.title: They keep my feet warmer then my Merrell's.
customer_reviews.text: They keep my feet warmer then my Merrell's. Little wide but thats ok because I can wear thicker socks and not be uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Dry and warm
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Very comfortable and have worn them out in all sorts of weather down to -25F. Stayed dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Shurley12

customer_reviews.title: Weak upper material
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof for a week. Had cold wet feet all winter. Not much left of the uppers. Will be shopping for something else this year.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots have already owned a pair of these for 2years very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: larger
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. Key Point: You should buy one size larger than normal. I usually fit 8. This time I brought size 9 and it fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: Rui Liu

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot. My feet were always cold but not now.
customer_reviews.author: flatfoot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little undersized but held up well in hours of temperatures in the teens in the artic.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality, but size 9, does not fit me, my size is 8.5
customer_reviews.author: Verencean Ion

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Solid fit, if a tiny bit on the small side. Very comfortable and warm, with good snow traction and they're easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are nice, but they run about a half-size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boots are nice but the sizing is off. Take one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: pawel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoes. Looks awesome. Very good quality. It is my second Baffin shoes, so like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Good warmth, and are absolutely waterproof. I ordered a half size larger than normal like people said to do but they were a little big on me. Who knows, different strokes for different folks.
customer_reviews.author: Broncorado

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots and Fits..
customer_reviews.text: Great Boots and Fit just right..I wear a 9 1/2 in all shoes..But a 10 was the right call for these boots..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mares

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Dry
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these boots on some cold days working outside and my feet have stayed very warm. The insulation is great. I also cleared the driveway of 8" of very heavy wet snow and my feet were warm and dry the entire time. The boots have great grip in slippery conditions as well.
customer_reviews.author: cjw

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the Baffin Men's Boots for my husband and they hit it off right away! Comfortable, not too heavy, and no need to brake them in. I didn't love the fact that you can see the adhesive residue on some of the boot's pieces, I hope they hold well! So far, Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Banks

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who usually fits easily into a size 14, but these were so small length wise he couldn't wear them. It's a real pitty as they are the really nice looking boots but size 14 is the largest so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking boot. Terrific company. Superior product. I will purchase other Baffin products.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These are not waterproof so I returned and purchased some survivor boots from walmart which are. My one boot leaked from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Willbeoutdoors

customer_reviews.title: Positive Reviews are true
customer_reviews.text: Great boots!! They fit as expected and are feather light. I wouldn't take them to Alaska, but they can handle the Mid - West in the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: 1776 SUPREME

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Snow Boot fit as expected, it hasn't been tested in extreme low temperatures. Will update asap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baffin Men's Zone Shoe
product_meta.description: Blast through the winter terrain in the Baffin Zone boots. Breathable soft shell synthetic upper. Waterproof membrane ensures feet stay dry and protected from the elements. Extended toe rand for extra protection. Tongue and heel pull loops for easy on and off. Plush collar for added comfort. High-traction rubber outsole for optimal traction over multi-surfaces. Temperature Rated: -4 °F/ -20 °C. Measurements: Heel Height: 1 in Weight: 1 lb 7 oz Circumference: 15 in Shaft: 6 in Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair. Baffin's Zone boot is a feature packed winter sport boot that is lightly insulated, lightweight and built to last. The Zone is a great choice for cold weather trekking whether it is on a snowy trail or to the next pub.
